## Générations
```{r generations}
    vecteur = rep(0, 50)
    for (i in 1:50){
      myseed = set.seed(i)
      syn_ctree = syn(df, method = "ctree", seed = myseed)
    }
```

## Simulation
```{r simulation}
    matrice = matrix(0, nrow = 1, ncol = 100)
    for (i in 1:100) {
        syn_ctree = syn(df, method = "ctree", seed = i)
        matrice[i] = as.integer(replicated.uniques(syn_ctree, df)[3])
    }
    cat("Après 100 synthétisations, le nombre d'uniques répliqués est de :", sum(!(matrice == 0)))
```
